changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user ( id UUID DEFAULT RANDOM_UUID() PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, companyId UUID, authorityId UUID, CONSTRAINT fk_user_company FOREIGN KEY (companyId) REFERENCES company(id) CONSTRAINT fk_user_authority FOREIGN KEY (authorityId) REFERENCES authority(id) );
